alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Fayette; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 6:44PM EDT until August 25 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Woodford County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Anderson County in central Kentucky... West central Fayette County in central Kentucky... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 643 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Versailles, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Versailles, Cardinal Hill, Dunbar High School, Midway, Firmantown, Gaybourn, Blue Grass Airport, Elk Chester and Tyrone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
